name: Krabus Finds Himself
description:
Krabus leaves the 9 to 5 bustle in favor of a more natural life on the beach. Made for the I Can't Draw But I Want To Make A Game Jam. Lost motivation in the middle and didn't get to add as much content as I was hoping to.

Controls:

WASD : Move

E: Interact

Control: Shoot

Audio was all taken from FreeSound.org so I can't take credit for any of the music or sound effects.

Just ignore the bugs.
